DOC.brief_summary: Study to determine if the addition of lutein to infant formula supports healthy growth and development in healthy full term infants.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Lutein in S-26 Gold On Growth And Safety
DOC.criteria: Healthy infants aged 014 days Full Term birth and AGA Parent(s) signed informed consent Unhealthy infant Participation in other clinical trial Use of prohibited medications
DOC.keyword: Effect of lutein fortification growth healthy term infants
